sentences.en: A borough of central England north of Leicester.
sentences.cn: 英格兰中部莱斯特北部的自治区.

sentences.en: A borough of southwest - central England on the Severn River west - northwest of London.
sentences.cn: 格洛斯特英格兰中西南部一 自治 市,在伦敦西北偏西的塞文河上.

sentences.en: A borough of west - central England on the Dee River south - southeast of Liverpool.
sentences.cn: 英国中西部市镇,位于利物浦东南偏南处迪河上.

sentences.en: A freehold property situates in the borough of Richmond.
sentences.cn: 位于里士满行政区的完全保有房产.

sentences.en: Borough Councils were also granted the power to buy reading material for their libraries.
sentences.cn: 各个市镇议会也被授予了购买公共图书馆资料的权力.

sentences.en: Collingham is located in the Royal Borough of Kensington and Chelsea, London.
sentences.cn: 伦敦克林汉姆学院坐落在伦敦皇家行政区的肯辛顿与切尔西.

sentences.en: Families of six or seven are the norm in Borough Park.
sentences.cn: 在区公园住宅区六口或七口之家十分普遍。

sentences.en: He lives in the Borough of Brooklyn.
That's what happened to Harry Barritt of London's Bromley borough.
sentences.cn: 住在伦敦的布罗姆利自治市的哈里.巴里特就经历了此事.

sentences.en: The borough is twinned with Kasel in Germany.
sentences.cn: 该自治市与德国的卡瑟尔市结成了友好城市。

sentences.en: the borough of Queens in New York City
The borough of Queens offers a great variety of ethnic residential neighborhoods.
sentences.cn: 皇后区则有各个不同种族的住宅区.

sentences.en: The Department is inviting applications from groups within the Borough.
sentences.cn: 该部门欢迎本行政区内各团体提出申请。

sentences.en: The head of government of a city, town, borough, or municipal corporation.
sentences.cn: 许多市政规划者认为,城市, 至少是市中心, 不应该有车辆通过.

sentences.en: The the city of Oxford now matched the parliamentary borough.
sentences.cn: 牛津市现在已经可以与这座国会选区相提并论了.

trans.tran_cn: 自治的市镇，有议员选举权的市镇，纽约市五个行政区之一
trans.tran_en: a town, or part of a large city, that is responsible for managing its own schools, hospitals, roads etc
